summary.span: 表示可通过键或索引访问的键/值对的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are accessible by the key or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个元素都是存储在 对象中的键/值对。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 不能 `null`键，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 与 类的元素不同， 的元素不按键进行排序。The elements of an are not sorted by the key, unlike the elements of a class. 可以通过键或索引来访问元素。You can access elements either by the key or by the index. C#语言的 `foreach` 语句（Visual Basic 中`For Each`）返回集合中每个元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns objects that are of the type of each element in the collection. 由于 集合中的每个元素都是键/值对，因此元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the collection is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 而是 元素类型。Instead, the element type is . 下面的代码演示C#、Visual Basic 和C++语法。The following code shows C#, Visual Basic and C++ syntax. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/source2.cpp#06)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/source2.cs#06)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#06](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/source2.vb#06)] `foreach` 语句是枚举器周围的包装器，它仅允许从集合读取，而不允许写入。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何创建、填充和修改 集合，以及使用两种方法来显示 的内容：一种方法是使用 和 属性，另一种方法是通过 方法创建枚举器。The following code example demonstrates the creation, population and modification of an collection, as well as two techniques to display the contents of the : one using the and properties and the other creating an enumerator through the method. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#00)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 集合中的每个键都必须是唯一的。Every key in a collection must be unique. 默认比较器是 的键实现。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的创建和填充。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能 `null`键，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置 集合中不存在的键的值;但是，如果 中已经存在指定的键，则设置 属性将覆盖旧值。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the collection; however, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素，而是引发 。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements but instead throws . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的创建和填充。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果键不存在或者如果 `null`该键，则使用 属性可以返回 null 值。Using the property can return a null value if the key does not exist or if the key is `null`. 使用 方法确定 集合中是否存在特定的键。Use the method to determine if a specific key exists in the collection. 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象的 并在 `item` 上 方法来确定 `item` 是否存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection's objects' and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，此决定是使用集合中对象上的 `item` 参数的 和 方法进行的。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的修改。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中， 方法用于确定是否存在某个条目，然后再尝试将其删除。In this example, the method is used to determine if an entry exists before attempting to remove it. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . summary.span: 返回遍历 集合的 对象。

span.span: Returns an object that iterates through the collection.
An object for the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic， C# ][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举器。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将 集合的内容显示到控制台。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to display the contents of the collection to the console. 在此示例中， 方法用于获取传递到显示内容的方法的 对象。In this example, the method is used to obtain an object that is passed to a method that displays the contents. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#03)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#03)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#03](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#03)] [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#05)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#05)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#05](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#05)]

param.span: 该值可以为 。

span.span: The value can be .

summary.span: 在指定索引处用指定键和值将新项插入到 集合中。

span.span: Inserts a new entry into the collection with the specified key and value at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 参数等于 集合中的项数，则 `key` 和 `value` 参数将追加到集合的末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the number of entries in the collection, the `key` and `value` parameters are appended to the end of the collection. 在插入点之后的项将向下移动以容纳新项，并且还会更新已移动项的索引。Entries that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new entry and the indexes of the moved entries are also updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的修改。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中， 方法用于将新项添加到 开头，并向下移动剩余项。In this example, the method is used to add a new entry to the beginning of the , moving the rest of the entries down. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取指示 集合是否为只读的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

value.span: 如果 集合为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modification of the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的修改。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中， 属性用于确定是否可以修改 。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the can be modified. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指定的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the specified value.

span.span: The value of the item at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[index]`。This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 该C#语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为[默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality.

param.name: key
param.span: 要获取或设置的值的键。

span.span: The key of the value to get or set.

summary.span: 获取或设置具有指定键的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value with the specified key.
The value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 如果未找到指定的键，尝试获取它将返回 ，尝试设置它将使用指定的键创建新元素。

span.span: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns , and attempting to set it creates a new element using the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]`。This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置 集合中不存在的键的值（例如 `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`）。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the collection (for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`). 但是，如果 中已经存在指定的键，则设置 属性将覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 不能 `null`键，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 若要区分由于找不到指定的键而返回的 `null`，以及由于指定键的值 `null`而返回 `null`，请使用 方法来确定 中是否存在该键。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的修改。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中， 属性用于修改带有密钥 `"testKey2"`的字典条目。In this example, the property is used to modify the dictionary entry with the key `"testKey2"`. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/cpp/ordereddictionary1.cpp#02)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/CS/OrderedDictionary1.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary1/VB/OrderedDictionary1.vb#02)]

span.span: Gets an object containing the keys in the collection.

span.span: An object containing the keys in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回 对象不是静态副本;相反， 引用原始 集合中的键。The returned object is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original collection. 因此，对 所做的更改将继续在 中反映出来。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和填充 集合，然后将内容打印到控制台。The following code example demonstrates the creation and population of an collection, and then prints the contents to the console. 在此示例中， 和 属性将传递到显示内容的方法。In this example, the and properties are passed to a method that displays the contents. 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at . remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除项之后的项将上移以占据空出的点，还会更新移动项的索引。The entries that follow the removed entry move up to occupy the vacated spot and the indexes of the entries that move are also updated. 如果 集合不包含具有指定键的项，则 保持不变且不引发异常。If the collection does not contain an entry with the specified key, the remains unchanged and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 集合的修改。The following code example demonstrates the modification of an collection. 在此示例中， 方法用于从 中删除具有密钥 `"keyToDelete"` 的条目。In this example, the method is used to remove the entry with the key `"keyToDelete"` from the . 此代码是可以 查看的更大代码示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger code example that can be viewed at .
